name: tm47
effect: Teaches Steel Wing to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Low Sweep to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Steel Wing Gen I: Explosion)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user’s Defense stat.
